title: Shadow Theatre
altText: A drawing of Tigran Hamasyan wearing a yellow button up shirt and suspenders, looking to the right on an aquamarine watercolor background.

title: The Call Within
altText: Tigran Hamasyan standing with his arms up on a background including filigree, planets and outer space.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
altText: An old-looking portrait of the torso and right arm  of someone holding a bouquet of pink roses, surrounded by a decorated circular frame on a dark green background.

title: Takk...
altText: An ink impression of someone standing behind a forest, on a tan background.

title: Valtari
altText: a green-tinted and degraded photo of a ship levitating above an ocean.

title: Hail to the Thief
altText: a painting of a hill containing various words of social commentary on a blue sky background.

title: In Rainbows
altText: 'In Rainbows' written several times in different colors with 'Radiohead' twice at the bottom, on a splattered paint background.

title: OK Computer
altText: A highly edited image of a highway. In the top left corner is written 'OK Computer', with text beneath reading 'Radiohead'.

title: Kid A
altText: Highly edited digital art of jagged glaciers and their reflections on a sheet of ice.

title: A Moon Shaped Pool
altText: A bird's-eye view of icebergs on a body of water.

title: And the Glass Handed Kites
altText: The band members' heads poorly Photoshopped on a black background with the text 'mew' written in shaky cursive.

title: No More Stories...
altText: Many colorful, translucent egg shaped characters nested inside each other over-layed on top of a butterfly with the album title and 'MEW' written above.

title: Floral EP
altText: A painting of colorful flowers edited to look like a kaleidoscope.

title: The Second Floral EP
altText: A painting of colorful flowers edited to look like a kaleidoscope.

title: Floral LP
altText: An swirly abstract painting resembling flowers.

title: (untitled album)
altText: A drawing of three headless people wearing button up shirts and jeans, holding chainsaws and walking left.

title: American Football
altText: A shot of the top of a white house with the upstairs lit and a dead tree, taken in the evening with an eerie green sky.

title: El Ten Eleven
altText: An airplane flying upward through a colorful sunset with the text 'El Ten Eleven'.

title: Mr. Beast
altText: A painting of strangely formed people of various ages sitting at a bar that is dripping with milk.

title: Rock Action
altText: Multiple layers of seemingly AI generated images (including spiky balls, washer-like discs and humanoid creature) with a red filter and very saturated. 'MOGWAI' is written in all caps in the center along with 'Rock Action' multiple times inside it.

title: Low Level Owl: Volume 1
altText: A feather on a white background with the text 'The Appleseed Cast', 'Low Level Owl: Volume One', and other informational text about the album.

title: Low Level Owl: Volume 2
altText: Two feathers on a white background with the text 'The Appleseed Cast', 'Low Level Owl: Volume One', and other informational text about the album.

title: The Devil, You + Me
altText: A painting of someone standing in a body of water surrounded by various birds during a sunset, with the 'The Notwist' and 'The Devil, You + Me' Written in the top corner.

title: Lonerism
altText: A shot looking in at the 'Jardin du Luxembourg' through a fence, with the artist name and album title written in a circle in the top corner.

title: Minecraft - Volume Beta
altText: A black cube with blocky protrusions with orange sides with another similar cube nested inside.

title: Minecraft - Volume Alpha
altText: A grass block from Minecraft (very pixellated cube of dirt with 3D grass pixels protruding from the top.

title: Crumbling
altText: A person standing in a desert holding a stick in dusty air, with the artist name and album title written in korean.

title: An Anxious Object
altText: A black and white image of a open blank book with many black grainy spots. At the top the album title and artist name are written.

title: West
altText: A red painting with abstract brush strokes and '[live session ep]' written under the artist name and album title.

title: Hello Turbine
altText: A painting of a white mandala on a textured background split vertically down the middle, the left side red and the right side green. The artist name and album title are written in the bottom left.

title: Greener Grass
altText: A seemingly AI generated image of yellow flowers with the artist name and album title in the top left.

title: We Have The Facts And We're Voting Yes
altText: A drawing of two people running with Different colored polka-dots below them on a tan background. The artist name an album title are written above them.

title: The Stability EP
altText: The artist name written in large white letters on a red background, with the album title written in small black letters below it.

title: Transatlanticism
altText: A painting of a crow tangled in red yarn on a yellow background. The album title and artist name are written at the top.

title: Plans
altText: Red Coral above some green plant matter in front of a skyscraper, With the album title and artist name written at the bottom.

title: Little Worlds
altText: A still-shot of a water droplet impacting a body of water. The resulting water drops shot upward are edited to look like planets.

title: Throw Down Your Heart: The Complete Africa Sessions
altText: a drawing of a green banjo with a yellow drawing of Africa inside it, and the artist name an album title written in a sketch like font in red and yellow respectively.
